div.p:
You will build systems and internal tools to support the fraud prevention efforts of Analytic Insight. The job will include:
- Implementing internal tools for data ingestion, analysis, and modeling - Supporting operations of AI analytic systems and production software - Helping adoption of new tools and environments in AI projects
The candidate is expected to be self-motivated, pro-active and solution-oriented individual.
BS degree in computer science or equivalent field plus 1-3 years experience, or equivalent.
